column2: Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, adjusts his line, onto middle and off, Roy is solidly forward and defends to the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, hint of width outside off, ball comes on nicely to the bat, cut firmly square into the covers
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, on the pads, timed nicely with a flick but picks out square leg
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, can't find the gap again on the off side as he cuts off the front foot
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, dabbed down to third man to get off the mark
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, no run, full toss, hint of swing into Hales, clipped firmly to midwicket
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, a sweet flick from Roy, full and straight, plenty of bottom hand but again he picks out a fielder at midwicket although he can't quite stop it cleanly
Anwar Ali to Hales, no run, full outside off, shaping in, defended
Anwar Ali to Hales, 1 run, tight run! Hales works a straight delivery into midwicket, they set off straight away but Rizwan is very quick and a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have been out
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 wide, shoved way down the leg side, a tumbling take from Sarfraz
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, back outside off, he's on the front foot, drives it hard into the ground and it bounces to point...not finding the gaps early on
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, tight outside off, blocked firmly back down the pitch
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, some gentle swing into Roy on a full length and he clips to deep square leg
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 2 runs, short of a length, Roy on his toes and tucks it off his hip behind square on the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, round the wicket, angling in, Roy defends and the ball runs off a thick inside edge
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 1 run, back of a length outside off, driven square from the back foot behind point
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, pushed firmly into the leg side, space at midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, no run, left alone outside off

Mohammad Irfan to Hales, no run, appeal for lbw as Hales falls across the line playing to the leg side, but from round the wicket and where Irfan bowls from on the crease the angle is significant and it is heading down leg
Anwar Ali to Roy, FOUR, fortune for Roy! He comes forward and drives at a full delivery, takes an inside edge past the stumps and down to fine leg
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, on a length outside off, Roy is forward and defends
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, drives at another full ball, the bat twists in his hand and squirts into the leg side
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, opens the face as he walks into the shot to a ball outside off, backward point dives to make the save
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, played back from where it came with a perfectly straight bat this time
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, fuller outside off, a punchy drives finds mid-off
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 1 leg bye, on the pads, Hales doesn't make contact and it deflects into the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, dabbed away from around off stump to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 2 runs, on the legs again, flicked away behind square and Wahab runs around from leg leg
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 1 run, round the wicket, full outside off, 79mph, guided to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 2 runs, short outside off, Roy fetches it from quite wide with a flat-bat pull which goes through midwicket but he hasn't got his timing yet
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 2 runs, now, he's timed that much better, pushes forward into a length ball and sends it straight of mid-on
Anwar Ali to Hales, 1 run, more runs to third man as Hales plays this with an open face
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, superb fielding by Shehzad at point as Roy drives powerful on the up square of the wicket
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, uses his feet, comes down the pitch outside off, plays a short-arm pull but picks out midwicket where there is another fumble from Rizwan who then blames the light/shadows
Anwar Ali to Hales, no run, driven off the back foot to cover
Anwar Ali to Hales, no run, driven to backward point
Anwar Ali to Hales, FOUR, full on the pads and Hales slots this away wide of short fine leg with a well-timed flick
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 run, back of a length at off stump, angled down to third man...Roy has the face of someone battling a little at the moment
Wahab Riaz to Hales, no run, punched off the back foot to cover
Wahab Riaz to Hales, 1 run, cut away behind square but third man is able to keep them to a single
Wahab Riaz to Roy, FOUR, another edge! This one even closer to off stump. Roy aiming to drive through the off side, the ball skims past the timber off the bottom edge and beats the keeper
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, full at middle and off, 89mph, a thud of a defensive shot to cover
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, swing and a miss outside off as Roy as a dart at a full delivery going across him
Anwar Ali to Hales, no run, back of a length at off stump, played back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Hales, 1 run, whips a straight delivery through the leg side to deep square
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, full at off stump, a slightly slower ball at 73mph, driven back down the pitch...it was an offcutter
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, uses his bottom hand and takes this from outside off towards mid-on
Anwar Ali to Hales, FOUR, a poor delivery, low full toss on the pads, easily flicked away behind square
Anwar Ali to Hales, no run, full and straight, another strong flick but this time he picks out midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, full outside off, a good stride forward and he drives to cover
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 run, pulls the length back, just outside off, played down to third man
Wahab Riaz to Hales, no run, moves right across the crease, it's a back-of-a-length delivery which he dabs to the off side
Wahab Riaz to Hales, 1 run, parried away by slip as he dives to his right to try and cut off Hales late cut
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 run, tucked off the stumps out to deep square
Wahab Riaz to Hales, no run, a strong square drive at a wide delivery but backward point is in the way
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, good delivery, squares up Roy and brings an lbw shout as he plays right across the line but was high and probably pitched outside leg
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, much tighter this time, defended to the off side
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, forward and drives to cover
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 3 runs, gets this over the infield, gets underneath a full ball and deliberately goes in the air over cover but it doesn't skip away over a lush outfield
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 2 runs, cut wide of backward point, good placement by Hales as it's also wide of third man...brings up the fifty stand, a solid base for England
Mohammad Irfan to Hales, 1 run, guided down to third man again, straight to him on this occasion
Wahab Riaz to Hales, no run, full outside off, 89mph, Hales crabs forward and pushes to cover
Wahab Riaz to Hales, no run, back of a length, late cut but can't beat backward point
Wahab Riaz to Hales, 1 run, full outside off, a sweetly timed drive through the off side but there's a sweeper back on the cover fence now
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, opens the face to a back-of-a-length delivery on off stump and finds backward point
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 run, cuts off the front foot through point, the sweeper gets around
Wahab Riaz to Hales, 1 run, third man has been a popular route today and this is another single down there

Mohammad Irfan to Hales, OUT, terrific catch! Irfan breaks through. Hales going for a pull to a shortish delivery, comes off the toe of the bat as he tries to fetch it from outside off and the ball flies down to third man where Malik makes an excellent running catch to his left
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 2 runs, onto the front foot and drives, in the air for a while, but bisects gully and backward point
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, angled in from round the wicket, Roy takes his bottom hand off the bat as he defends
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, a late dab down to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Root, no run, short of a length outside off, Root onto his toes first ball and plays to backward point
Mohammad Irfan to Root, no run, lovely delivery! Round the wicket, angles in, then nips away off the seam to beat Root's edge by some distance...Irfan has been so impressive this series
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, back of a length outside off, 88mph, driven without much timing to mid-off
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, on the stumps, defended to the off side
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, tries to force this full delivery into the off side but can only push it back to the bowler
Wahab Riaz to Roy, FOUR, that's a cracker! His best of the day by far. A full delivery, on the stumps, and Roy drills straight through the line with a perfectly straight bat down the ground. Lovely.
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 run, drags the length back a touch, worked into midwicket
Wahab Riaz to Root, no run, onto the back foot, defended to mid-off
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, staying round the wicket, short outside off, cut to point
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, nearly chips to mid-on...a full ball, slower at 74mph, Roy is early on his drive but the ball lands a few metres short
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, no run, finds point again
Mohammad Irfan to Roy, 1 run, delicate this time, short of a length, Roy waits a fraction longer and flicks it down to third man through where slip would have been
Mohammad Irfan to Root, 1 run, sweetly played, a strong pull from Root which whistles through square leg but Babar Azam makes a full-length diving save at deep square

Mohammad Irfan to Roy, FOUR, very neatly played, oh that's super, he walks forward to a full delivery which is angling into the stumps, uses the angled and flicks it effortlessly through straight midwicket...Azam can't do anything about this one
Anwar Ali to Root, 1 run, short of a length outside off, driven to deep cover
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, full and straight, punched to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, walks forward into a defensive shot and plays to cover
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, full outside off, driven to left of mid-off
Anwar Ali to Root, 1 run, back of a length on off stump, opens the face, dabbed down to third man
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, another sweet piece of timing into the leg side but Rizwan dives across from midwicket
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, full and straight, played back to Yasir
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, driven into the leg side and can't beat midwicket
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, shorter, he goes back and pushes into the off side but can't find a gap
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, hint of slow spin, touch short again, but another dot ball into the off side
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, square cuts this behind point, backward point dives and parries the ball wide of short third man who was coming across behind him...but just one run
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, full and straight, played back to the bowler
Anwar Ali to Root, no run, full and straight and pushed back down the pitch
Anwar Ali to Root, 2 runs, on the pads, whipped tidily into the leg side and a quick call for the single
Anwar Ali to Root, no run, solidly forward and pushed into the covers
Anwar Ali to Root, 1 run, cut firmly but straight to backward point
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, full and straight, an easy-tempoed steer into the leg-side, presenting a very full face down the wicket
Anwar Ali to Root, no run, ferocious straight drive and Anwar must regret making such a spirited effort to grab it in his followthrough. That rattled his fingers hard
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, driven along the ground
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, open face, eased to wide mid-on
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, stepping back and across, a firm slap into the covers
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, driven on the up, into the covers again
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, pierces the gap again
Yasir Shah to Root, 2 runs, compact drive, into the gap in the covers, a well milked over
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, stands tall in the crease and pushed to mid-on, who fields with a dive
Anwar Ali to Roy, no run, chopped into the covers again
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, steered to mid-on
Anwar Ali to Root, 1 run, a hint of width, filleted down to third man
Anwar Ali to Roy, 2 runs, nicely deflected down to third man, a very late late cut, and that is his half-century, his second of the series
Anwar Ali to Roy, 1 run, clipped to leg
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, massive appeal but heading down the leg-side
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, down the track and clipped tantalisingly in the air, but inches short of Azhar at short midwicket... lucky...
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, down the track again, Yasir spots him coming and pulls back his length. Cat and mouse stuff...
Yasir Shah to Roy, FOUR, played against the spin, a bit of a panicky release shot, in all honesty, but well nailed in front of square
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, forward and punched into the covers. A good recovery from England after four dot-balls in that over
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, down the track, swiped airily into the leg-side
Shoaib Malik to Root, 2 runs, on the back foot, punched square into the covers, nice open face and an easy couple, into the gap
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, driven into the leg side

Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, on the back foot again, and Irfan's towering height is an easy single, even though he is nominally in position to cut it off. They have to turn on a special hazard light every time he bends down
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, pushed to the leg-side
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, on the pads again, an instant call. Good smart running from this pair
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, driven down the ground, another single
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, width, and slapped out to point
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, down the track, pushed to mid-on
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, forward and pushed to long-off
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, low full toss, driven hard but long-off is in place
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, angled bat, fended to point, a quick single is threatened but wisely turned down
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, on the hip, clipped to square leg
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, forward and driven to long-on, the score keeps ticking
Shoaib Malik to Roy, no run, half an appeal, but outside leg
Shoaib Malik to Roy, no run, clipped in the air, but short of short midwicket. Good teasing flight
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, on the hip, pulled round the corner and Root calls instantly as Yasir stoops to gather at backward square leg. Sharp running again
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, full length and fended away
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, forward and defended
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, tossed up, outside off, and flat-batted violently through cover. Beats the close catcher but is cut off in the deep
Yasir Shah to Root, SIX, bosh! Fetch that. Down on one knee, full swing against the spin, deposited grandly over midwicket
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, shuffling at the crease and dabbed out of the keeper's gloves to gully
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, worked into the off side again
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, whoomphed to cover. Lots of intent but the placement was lacking
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, clipped off the toes to square leg
Shoaib Malik to Roy, no run, flicked to the leg-side once again

Shoaib Malik to Roy, SIX, up and under! Roy feared for a moment he had got too much height and not enough velocity, like a badly launched Angry Bird, but it plopped out of the reach of long-off for a maximum!
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, nudged into the gap to let Root have a go
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, round the wicket, reverse sweep, but straight to backward point
Shoaib Malik to Root, 2 runs, down on one knee and flicked more conventionally this time, behind square
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, round the wicket, tossed onto the pads, and flicked out to square leg
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, another calm nurdle into the leg-side. It is his default one-day stroke
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 3 runs, dancing at the crease, cut firmly into the gap at extra cover. Well timed and placed
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, forward and pushed to cover
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, clipped to midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, on the hip, worked square once more
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, back of a length, cut down into the crease and tidied up at slip
Yasir Shah to Roy, 2 runs, energetic cut, down towards the rope at deep backward point
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, down the track, driven but not entirely timed. Long-off picks up
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, driven again, no great turn on offer and eased down the ground
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, short, this one turns but is watched all the way onto the bat. Cover fields
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, up onto the toes, on the back foot, steered out to extra cover, more measured accumulation from England
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, clipped out to midwicket again
Shoaib Malik to Root, 2 runs, worked into the off-side for a change as Root opens the face and picks off a couple to third man
Shoaib Malik to Root, 2 runs, wristy flick, on the up, through midwicket. The 150 is up
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, clipped to midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, swept, and though that passes down the leg side, it comes so close to clipping the leg bail that it is rightly not called a wide
Shoaib Malik to Root, 2 runs, a lap-sweep, more or less what he attempted to play last ball, but he connects this time, a lob over the keeper's shoulder to pick off another couple
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run
Yasir Shah to Roy, FOUR, beautiful strike, a full-blooded reverse sweep, big swing of the bat, and helped through third man
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, cut into the covers
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, on the pads, flicked to midwicket
Yasir Shah to Roy, 2 runs, driven on the up, anchored on the back foot, well cut off on the long-off boundary by a full-tilt Azhar
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, forward and blocked down the pitch
Wahab Riaz to Root, 1 run, on the back foot, punched into the covers
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, clunked into the covers
Wahab Riaz to Roy, 1 leg bye, on the pads, nurdled to backward square
Wahab Riaz to Root, 1 run, on the back foot, dead-batted to cover and a bit of a scamper to get up speed from a standing start
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, short, a mow across the line but that may be kept a bit low. No contact either way
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, through to the keeper
Shoaib Malik to Root, FOUR, down on one knee and flambeed out to midwicket. Top boshing!
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, worked into the gap
Shoaib Malik to Roy, 1 run, crunched out to cover
Shoaib Malik to Root, SIX, down the track, full extension of the arms, a spiralling straight six, and that is Root's fifty! A beautiful shot to reach his second of the series
Shoaib Malik to Root, no run, worked into the leg side again
Shoaib Malik to Root, 1 run, reverse sweep, and *beep beep beep*, Irfan lowers his crane to field and they steal an easy single
Wahab Riaz to Root, FOUR, shot! Leaning back, all timing and placement, a glide through backward point off only a nugget of width
Wahab Riaz to Root, 1 run, well timed again, in a similar direction, but third man is in place to field this time
Wahab Riaz to Roy, FOUR, flicked off the pads, whistles to the rope behind square, he's onto 98 ...
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, open face, dabbed to point
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, open face, dabbed to gully
Wahab Riaz to Roy, no run, again, attempts to pick the gap at third man, but with three dots in a row, it is time for drinks
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, touch short, Root rocks back and pulls to deep midwicket
Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, a low full toss won't do it, eased down the ground to long off
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, pushes forward and the ball squeezes off the inside edge to the leg side
Yasir Shah to Roy, no run, comes forward, hint of turn, thickish outside edge to short third man

Yasir Shah to Roy, 1 run, there it is! Roy has his maiden ODI hundred as he cuts a slightly short delivery out to deep cover. Comes off 113 balls. An outstanding innings, he didn't find it easy early on
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, pushed back to the bowler
Azhar Ali to Roy, 1 run, short and cut through cover to long off
Azhar Ali to Root, no run, beats him with a quicker one outside off which skids on as Root tries to dab to third man
Azhar Ali to Root, 1 run, tossed up full and straight, worked down the ground
Azhar Ali to Roy, no run, uses his feet, doesn't get to the pitch as Azhar drags his length back, pushed to cover
Azhar Ali to Roy, 1 run, tucked away
Azhar Ali to Root, 1 run, full and driven to long off
Yasir Shah to Root, no run, short outside off, swipe to cover off the bottom of the bat
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, short again, he rocks back and sends this through cover to the sweeper

Yasir Shah to Roy, OUT, he's gone now! Yasir gets a scalp. So it's hundred and out for Roy. He came down the pitch, looking to go straight down the ground, he skewed it towards long off and it didn't have the legs to clear the rope
Yasir Shah to Root, 1 run, driven to deep cover
Yasir Shah to Buttler, no run, full outside off, spins away, left alone
Yasir Shah to Buttler, 1 run, worked into the leg side to get off the mark and keep the strike
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 run, edged away from outside off, but short third man scurries across
Azhar Ali to Root, FOUR, that's a lovely on-the-up drive over extra cover, fully in control by Root as he places it between deep cover and long off
Azhar Ali to Root, no run, finds point this time, a slightly quicker delivery

Azhar Ali to Root, OUT, and he's got a wicket! Root goes for an expansive reverse sweep, doesn't make contact, then unbalances out of the crease and Sarfraz whips off the bails. Was that really needed from Root?
Azhar Ali to Morgan, no run, flicked to the leg side
Azhar Ali to Morgan, 1 leg bye, an appeal for lbw as this takes the pad to the leg side, beating leg stump
Mohammad Irfan to Morgan, 1 run, dropped into the off side
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, 1 run, round the wicket, short of a length, opens the face and slides off the face to third man
Mohammad Irfan to Morgan, 1 run, full and straight, tucked in front of square on the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, no run, back of a length outside off, pushed to backward point
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, no run, angling in from round the wicket, defended
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, no run, defended square into the off side
Azhar Ali to Morgan, 1 run, taken from outside off, flicked with bottom hand to long on
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 run, full on off stump, driven to deep cover
Azhar Ali to Morgan, 1 run, uses his feet, gets very close to the pitch and drills it along the ground to long on
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 run, drifts into the pads, tucked behind square
Azhar Ali to Morgan, no run, some more sharp spin for Azhar, turns into Morgan's pads from around middle and leg
Azhar Ali to Morgan, 1 run, plays with the turn into the leg side
Shoaib Malik to Morgan, 1 run, cut into the off side
Shoaib Malik to Buttler, SIX, brings out the slog sweep and makes good connection, Malik round the wicket, Buttler goes down on his back need and picks it up cleanly over deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Buttler, 1 run, flatter on the pads, nudged into the leg side
Shoaib Malik to Morgan, FOUR, dragged down a little short, Morgan is very quick to spot the length, put his weight onto the back foot and pulled over deep midwicket
Shoaib Malik to Morgan, no run, turn there, Morgan aiming to the leg side and gets a leading edge to point
Shoaib Malik to Morgan, FOUR, now Morgan slog sweeps, not quite middled as well as Buttler's, it's a flatter hit and goes one bounce to deep midwicket
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 run, down the pitch, makes it a full toss, driven to long off
Azhar Ali to Morgan, OUT, and he has another! Morgan charges down the pitch, might have been the googly from Azhar, Morgan swings and misses which offers Sarfraz a second stumping
Azhar Ali to Taylor, no run, full outside off, driven to cover
Azhar Ali to Taylor, 1 run, low full toss which is shovelled down the ground to long on
Azhar Ali to Buttler, no run, another googly, not sure Buttler picked it, nudged back down the pitch
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 run, a googly again, but this one is too short and Buttler can pull to deep square
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, 1 wide, short of a length, angled down the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, no run, back of a length outside off, he finds point
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, no run, fuller, pushed square to point
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, 1 run, pushes a length ball into a gap on the off side
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, no run, on a length outside off, 77mph, a cutter, Taylor is well across his crease and dabs to backward point

Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, SIX, terrific shot, he was so quick onto that, Irfan dropped a little short and his natural bounce made it pullable for Taylor who connects cleanly and sends it over long leg
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, no run, back outside off, short of a length, backward point prevents the single
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 2 runs, pushes forward, dribbles into the leg side...has to dive back into his ground returning for a second, good running
Azhar Ali to Buttler, no run, down the pitch, nice delivery, turns and Buttler pushes to cover

Azhar Ali to Buttler, SIX, this is straight down the ground, a massive strike from Buttler, beautifully clean as he strides down the pitch and launches into the stand above the sightscreen...dropped in the crowd
Azhar Ali to Buttler, 1 leg bye, full outside leg, goes to sweep and takes the pad to short third man
Azhar Ali to Taylor, no run, pushed back to the bowler
Azhar Ali to Taylor, 1 run, fuller, whipped to the on side, Azhar dives across to field but the ball sneaks underneath him and then steal a single
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, no run, round the wicket, full on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, 1 run, short of a length, takes his bottom hand off the bat and works to the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, FOUR, moves across to the off side and picks up a back-of-a-length delivery with a front-foot pull through square leg

Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, FOUR, and now he brings out the reverse scoop, flick over short third man...Buttler at his inventive best, he was going to scoop over fine leg the saw the ball was wider and went off side. Freak.

Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, 2 runs, huge appeal for lbw as he heaves across the line at a full toss, think there was an inside edge, and then there is a direct hit from backward point which ricochets away for a second run
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, FOUR, full outside, driven through backward point, deep point runs around - it's Yasir - he dives but he can't stop the ball cleanly and it dribbles into the boundary
Wahab Riaz to Taylor, 1 run, dropped square into the off side
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, FOUR, moves away to the leg side, opens up the off and carves this in the air over cover wide of the sweeper...Buttler into top gear
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, SIX, that's a few more! A mighty blow over the leg side this time, Wahab drops short and Buttler muscles it off the front foot over deep square leg
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, no run, very full and quite wide outside off, Buttler just inched to the leg side and let it go...not a wide. Back-of-the-hand slower ball
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 2 runs, low full toss angling into the batsman who flicks down to long on and these two are so quick it's a comfortable brace
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 1 run, shorter delivery, on the pads, pulled down to long leg and that's a 30-ball fifty for Buttler...super innings
Anwar Ali to Buttler, no run, full outside off, swing and miss as he aims to the leg side
Anwar Ali to Buttler, FOUR, another rasping pull from Buttler as Anwar drops short, he doesn't have the pace for that, and it's swatted through square leg
Anwar Ali to Buttler, 2 runs, goes full this time, Buttler jabs it into the pitch and it bounces straight down the ground...Taylor makes it into a second, again
Anwar Ali to Buttler, FOUR, this is reverse swept off the stumps, played it as though he has done it all his life (which he has)...wonderful stuff
Anwar Ali to Buttler, SIX, dragged down short and it's another full pint into the stands at deep square leg as Buttler pulls with effortless ease. Carnage.

Anwar Ali to Buttler, SIX, big full toss this time which also disappears over the leg-side boundary, not easy to dispatch a full toss like that but Buttler was able to easily clear the boundary. Close to a no-ball for height
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, 1 run, round the wicket, now Taylor is down the pitch and drives to deep cover...feeding the strike back to Buttler
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, FOUR, scooped over the keeper! He just keeps going. Was a short-of-a-length delivery, he moved to the off side and placed it straight back over Sarfraz...need a long stop
Mohammad Irfan to Buttler, 1 run, good full delivery, inside-edged to the leg side
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, 2 runs, full outside off, scythed off a thick outside edge high down to third man but drops short of the fielder
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, no run, loses his shape a little this time as he charges down on the line of leg stump and misses his heave to leg
Mohammad Irfan to Taylor, OUT, not quite the distance! Taylor aiming to clear long on, swinging a full delivery from Irfan down the ground, couldn't quite get the distance to go with the height
Wahab Riaz to Ali, no run, full outside off, Moeen drives over the top
Wahab Riaz to Ali, 1 run, slower ball outside off, Moeen works it into the leg side
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, FOUR, low full toss outside off, steered between short third man and backward point...playing with the field
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 2 runs, lobs into space! Got underneath a pull this time, went high into the air, but none of three fielders covering in the deep can reach it
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 1 run, good yorker, pinged straight down the pitch and into the non-striker's stumps
Wahab Riaz to Ali, 1 run, a yorker at off stump, drilled to mid-off so Moeen has the strike
Anwar Ali to Ali, 1 run, a slower bouncer, swatted through midwicket
Anwar Ali to Buttler, no run, goes across his stump to scoop over fine leg again, but doesn't make contact this time
Anwar Ali to Buttler, SIX, another full house for him, a half-tracked from Anwar which Buttler swings off the front foot over deep midwicket
Anwar Ali to Buttler, 2 runs, worked through midwicket
Anwar Ali to Buttler, SIX, oh, what a shot! Full on off stump and he drills it straight down the ground over long-off...onto 98

Anwar Ali to Buttler, SIX, and he's done it! What an innings from Buttler! He reaches a 46-ball hundred with a huge hit over deep midwicket. Fed more length from Anwar and Buttler wasn't going to miss out. What a comeback for him.
Wahab Riaz to Ali, 1 run, full and driven down the ground...over to you, Jos
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 5 wides, round the wicket, speared down the leg side, wide of a diving Sarfraz
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, no run, slower ball, full outside off, Buttler swings and misses for a rare occasion
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 1 no ball, that's filthy, a massive full toss outside off, called no-ball for height
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, FOUR, ah, that's a delightful shot...most batsmen would try to smash a free hit, but Buttler just flicked this calmly off his toes behind square on the leg side
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, FOUR, length ball, angling into him, and he splits the gap between long on and deep midwicket with a solid club
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 2 runs, low full toss outside off, driven to deep cover and they canter a couple
Wahab Riaz to Buttler, 2 runs, finishes full, flat-bats over deep cover, lands short of the sweeper and it's another brace to end a fantastic innings from Buttler (and England)
